# import dataset
```{r }
#df <- read_rds("/Users/yayang/Documents/GitHub/amr-uom-brit/output/matched_ab.rds")
df <- read_rds(here::here("output","matched_ab.rds"))
table(df$case)
df=df[!is.na(df$case),]
table(df$case)
```



filter: remove multiple controls
```{r }
df=df%>% distinct(patient_id,patient_index_date, .keep_all=T)
table(df$case)

```


check variables
```{r }
df$exposure_period=-df$exposure_period
str(df)
```

replace NA  
```{r }
df[is.na(df)] <- 0 #antibiotics=zero

#add indicator for missing value
df$prescribe_time_0=ifelse(df$prescribe_times==0,0,1) #1= ab user ,0=non 
df$prescribe_time_1=ifelse(df$prescribe_times==1,1,0) 
df$prescribe_time_2=ifelse(df$prescribe_times==2,1,0) 
df$prescribe_time_3=ifelse(df$prescribe_times>=3,1,0) # missing SD, CV
str(df)

```

# merge data
```{r }
df=merge(DF,df,by=c("patient_id","patient_index_date"), all.x = T)
rm(DF)
table(df$case)
names(df)
```

```{r eval=FALSE, include=FALSE}
set.seed(1024)
all_idx <- 1:nrow(df)

train_idx <- sample(all_idx, nrow(df) * 0.8)
test_idx <- all_idx[!all_idx %in% train_idx]

pred_col=c("patient_id","patient_index_date", "case","total_ab", "ab_prescriptions","ab_types","prescribe_times","exposure_period","recent_ab_days", "broad_prop" ,"broad_ab_prescriptions","interval_mean","interval_sd","interval_CV","length_mean", "length_sd", "length_CV","prescribe_time_0","prescribe_time_1","prescribe_time_2","prescribe_time_3",col,"AB_1_type","AB_6wk_type" ,"interval_med" ,"length_med" ,"ab_6w_binary" , "AB_6wk")

train_X <- df[train_idx,pred_col]
valid_X <- df[test_idx,pred_col]

train_Y <- df[train_idx,"case"]
valid_Y <- df[test_idx,"case"]


table(train_X$case)
table(valid_X$case)
```

```{r}
saveRDS(train_X, here::here("output","train_X.rds"))
saveRDS(train_Y, here::here("output","train_Y.rds"))
saveRDS(valid_X, here::here("output","valid_X.rds"))
saveRDS(valid_Y, here::here("output","valid_Y.rds"))

```
